How often does r find work stressful

Source: R/gss_vars_501.R
stress.Rd

stress

Source

General Social Survey https://gss.norc.org

Details

Question Now some more questions about your working conditions. one code for each item below to show how often it applies to your work. How often... C. Do you find your work stressful?

Values

  • 1 always

  • 2 often

  • 3 sometimes

  • 4 hardly ever

  • 5 never

  • NA(d) can't choose / NA(i) iap / NA(j) I don't have a job / NA(m) dk, na, iap / NA(n) no answer / NA(p) not imputable / NA(r) refused / NA(s) skipped on web / NA(u) uncodeable / NA(x) not available in this release / NA(y) not available in this year / NA(z) see codebook
